Zhent02_20.text: Then someone kidnapped a duke - right on our bloody doorstep.
Zhent02_20.context: NodeContext: Vague disgust - she sees herself as a professional, and is disdainful of those who can't run similarly efficient operations.

Zhent02_105.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_105.text: The Flaming Fist will want someone to blame, and I don't plan to leave anything pointing our way.
Zhent02_105.context: NodeContext: She's disdainful of the Flaming Fist, a rival organisation known for corruption and inefficiency.

Zhent02_118.speaker: Player
Zhent02_118.text: The Fist already know you're here. They just don't care.

Zhent02_74.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_74.text: Maybe not now, no. But that'll change once the council gets involved. They'll want heads to roll.
Zhent02_74.context: NodeContext: Dismissing our point - she has more experience in these matters than we do.

Zhent02_80.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_80.text: We're getting out - just one last loose end to take care of. Help me and I'll make it worth your while.
Zhent02_80.context: NodeContext: Firm - the matter is settled, so are we going to be useful to her or not?

Zhent02_58.speaker: Player
Zhent02_58.text: I don't want to get caught up in any of this.

Zhent02_1.speaker: Player
Zhent02_1.text: This job you mentioned - what's involved?

Zhent02_14.speaker: Player
Zhent02_14.text: Good luck with that. I don't want to get involved.

Zhent02_31.speaker: Player
Zhent02_31.text: A job? You were ready to kill me a moment ago.

Zhent02_36.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_36.text: Still am, as it goes. Take it as a mark of respect.
Zhent02_36.context: NodeContext: Shrugging, unconcerned - she's ready to kill anyone at any moment, it's not personal.

Zhent02_39.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_39.text: But right now, I reckon we're better off friends than enemies. You interested or not?
Zhent02_39.context: NodeContext: Getting back on track, not interested in our concerns - just the job at hand.

Zhent02_40.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_40.text: Some of our people are missing - more importantly, so is their cargo.
Zhent02_40.context: NodeContext: Grim - we're getting to the heart of the matter. She's fairly unflappable but this job is extremely important.

Zhent02_75.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_75.text: Find them. Keep them alive if you can. Failing that, just bring that shipment back. Unopened.
Zhent02_75.context: NodeContext: Giving orders, conveying grim urgency.

Zhent02_47.speaker: Player
Zhent02_47.text: I already found them. They're dead.

Zhent02_32.speaker: Player
Zhent02_32.text: I found a pair that sound like your men - being swarmed by gnolls.

Zhent02_61.speaker: Player
Zhent02_61.text: What's so important about this cargo?

Zhent02_109.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_109.text: I'm offering hard coin, not idle answers.
Zhent02_109.context: NodeContext: Annoyed at our probing - she's offering us a job for a lot of money, and that's all we need to know.

Zhent02_22.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_22.text: All you need to know is that I'm willing to pay a hideous sum to get it back - unopened.
Zhent02_22.context: NodeContext: Laying the job out very clearly, not going to be pushed into any more detail

Zhent02_125.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_125.text: Good. Backtrack along the road to the east and look for a wagon. Bodies. The usual.
Zhent02_125.context: NodeContext: Satisfied - and immediately down to business.

Zhent02_33.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_33.text: Time was, no one dared touch a caravan bearing our colours.
Zhent02_33.context: NodeContext: Stating how notorious her group is, how serious it is that someone attacked a shipment

Zhent02_35.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_35.text: Find whoever did this and remind them why.
Zhent02_35.context: NodeContext: Grim - giving us permission to hurt whoever hurt her group.

Zhent02_70.speaker: Player
Zhent02_70.text: Sounds shady. I'd rather not get involved.

Zhent02_55.speaker: Player
Zhent02_55.text: I'm just here to trade - I have my own concerns.

Zhent02_85.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_85.text: And making a small fortune ain't one of them?
Zhent02_85.context: NodeContext: Skeptical that our goals are any more important or lucrative than the job she's offering.

Zhent02_16.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_16.text: Spend your coin and be on your way. But be quick about it - we're blowing this place soon.
Zhent02_16.context: NodeContext: Shrugging - we can suit ourselves but if we're not going to be of use, we can do whatever trading we want and get out.

Zhent02_49.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_49.text: What're you jawing at me for, recruit? You've got work to do.
Zhent02_49.context: NodeContext: Expectant - she spared our life so we could carry out an important task for her. So why aren't we doing it?

Zhent02_53.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_53.text: You've already brought me bad news - tell me you've got something better this time.
Zhent02_53.context: NodeContext: When last we spoke we told her her men were dead - but she's more concerned with the shipment that was with them. She's waiting on word from us.

Zhent02_110.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_110.text: I owe you one for saving my people. The Zhentarim look out for their own - even if it's Rugan.

Zhent02_106.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_106.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands over moneyInternalNodeContext: Player gets reward.

Zhent02_87.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_87.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands over moneyInternalNodeContext: Player gets reward.

Zhent02_124.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_124.text: Pity we didn't have you on the job from the start.

Zhent02_4.speaker: Player
Zhent02_4.text: What makes that cargo so important?

Zhent02_111.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_111.text: You did me a service - doesn't make you one of us.

Zhent02_82.speaker: Player
Zhent02_82.text: Rubble? What are you planning to do?

Zhent02_42.speaker: Player
Zhent02_42.text: Rubble? What are you planning to do?

Zhent02_123.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_123.text: Someone kidnapped a duke - right on our bloody doorstep. The Flaming Fist will need someone to blame.

Zhent02_41.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_41.text: I don't plan on it being us.

Zhent02_86.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_86.text: Our trader can show you some of our more exotic items, now - but don't delay. This place is likely to be rubble soon.

Zhent02_0.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_0.text: That's worth some coin. And my thanks.
Zhent02_0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands over moneyInternalNodeContext: Player gets reward.

Zhent02_112.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_112.text: That's worth some coin. And my thanks.
Zhent02_112.context: CinematicNodeContext: Hands over moneyInternalNodeContext: Player gets reward.

Zhent02_Trap_35.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_35.text: You're the one who recruited me, Rugan.
Zhent02_Trap_35.context: CinematicNodeContext: For this entire exchange, Zarys is standing about ten feet above us on a raised platform.NodeContext: She's overseeing the torture of an agent of hers - one who originally recruited her to the organisation. Tone is chiding and also vaguely disgusted - he should have known better.

Zhent02_Trap_26.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_26.text: You're the one who taught me rule number one, remember?
Zhent02_Trap_26.context: CinematicNodeContext: A shot of the torturer from behind, the moving aside to reveal Rugan.NodeContext: As if reflecting on 'good old days', but with a harder edge

Zhent02_Trap_37.speaker: Rugan
Zhent02_Trap_37.context: NodeContext: <Bound to a chair> Any moan / gurgle of pain or fear. He's been tortured for quite some time and is too exhausted to scream

Zhent02_Trap_53.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_53.text: No. Olly didn't remember either, did you Olly?
Zhent02_Trap_53.context: NodeContext: Temporarily switching focus to a figure bound beside the tortured agent - he's the new recruit -  already dead from his wounds. but she's talking to him almost cheerfully.

Zhent02_Trap_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Close-up of Olly lying on the floor - already tortured to death,NodeContext: Olly is bound to a chair on the floor, tortued to death

Zhent02_Trap_57.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_57.text: You're dead the moment you steal from the Zhentarim.
Zhent02_Trap_57.context: NodeContext: All joviality dropped - flat and icy-cold.

Zhent02_Trap_41.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_41.context: NodeContext: Turning to us, making it clear the threat is intended for us also.

Zhent02_Trap_45.speaker: Narrator
Zhent02_Trap_45.text: *You recall an old Zhentarim proverb coined by their founder.*

Zhent02_Trap_12.speaker: Player
Zhent02_Trap_12.text: 'Steel ends enemies, but gold makes friends.'

Zhent02_Trap_25.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_25.text: You've read Manshoon. Seems you know our ways better than poor Rugan here.
Zhent02_Trap_25.context: NodeContext: Reassessing you - you've responded to the situation exactly as she would have.

Zhent02_Trap_17.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_17.text: There's not much money in retribution, true...
Zhent02_Trap_17.context: NodeContext: Considering - you've made a fair argument and she's leaning towards being merciful.

Zhent02_Trap_38.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_38.text: Well, at least you've read Manshoon. Makes your 'emissary' lie a touch more tasteful.

Zhent02_Trap_46.speaker: Player
Zhent02_Trap_46.text: Those explosives are sensitive - be a shame if something set them off.

Zhent02_Trap_14.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_14.text: ... you bloody wouldn't! Hah. You've got guts. I respect that.
Zhent02_Trap_14.context: CinematicNodeContext: Showing the explosives.NodeContext: A long pause while she sizes you up - you've just threatened to trigger explosives and kill everyone present, yourself included. She's impressed, and it's a threat she can't ignore.

Zhent02_Trap_31.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_31.text: Tell you what: you've already taken Rugan's cargo, so finish the job and I'll let you live. Deliver it to Baldur's Gate.
Zhent02_Trap_31.context: NodeContext: She's calculating - she was ready to kill you, but you've proven that you might actually be the person to finish an all important job for her.

Zhent02_Trap_39.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_39.context: NodeContext: Off-hand, as if asking you to kill an unarmed man she's known for years is a mere formality.

Zhent02_Trap_33.speaker: Rugan
Zhent02_Trap_33.text: Wait! WAIT! It was Olly, I SWEAR IT WAS OLLY!
Zhent02_Trap_33.context: NodeContext: <Bound to a chair> Hysterical, panicking - he knows he's about to die but is begging nonetheless.

Zhent02_Trap_10.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_10.text: Show some respect, Rugan. The boy was loyal to you 'til the end.
Zhent02_Trap_10.context: NodeContext: As if disappointed in her former mentor - just wants this business over with.

Zhent02_Trap_13.speaker: Rugan
Zhent02_Trap_13.context: NodeContext: <Bound to a chair> Begging right up until the moment you kill him (dies at end of node, either stabbed or shot)

Zhent02_Trap_51.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_51.text: And just like that, everyone profits.
Zhent02_Trap_51.context: NodeContext: Breezy, as if some simple matter has now been settled.

Zhent02_Trap_20.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_20.text: All right then, recruit - you can stock up here and be on your way. Bring the cargo to Baldur's Gate. Someone there will make contact.
Zhent02_Trap_20.context: NodeContext: Taking on her military tone - she's your superior and she's giving you orders.

Zhent02_Trap_47.speaker: Player
Zhent02_Trap_47.text: Small problem - I don't actually have the cargo.

Zhent02_Trap_27.speaker: Player
Zhent02_Trap_27.text: The cargo's been opened. Not a problem, I hope?

Zhent02_Trap_21.speaker: Player
Zhent02_Trap_21.text: Profit's more important than vengeance. Let's make a deal.

Zhent02_Trap_55.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_55.text: Hah! The silver tongue on you. Usually I'd rip it out, but... well, these aren't normal times.
Zhent02_Trap_55.context: NodeContext: Genuinely amused - you're trying to talk your way out of an impossible situation, and she respects that.

Zhent02_Trap_0.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_0.text: ... you were so close. So close to walking out of this alive.
Zhent02_Trap_0.context: NodeContext: Air of finality, but she says it as if it's a shame.

Zhent02_Trap_54.speaker: Player
Zhent02_Trap_54.text: I've already shown I've got more wits than Rugan. Let's work together.

Zhent02_Trap_18.speaker: Player
Zhent02_Trap_18.text: I'm going to walk out of here alive. Play it right, and so will you.

Zhent02_Trap_59.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_59.text: Hah - the fire in you! Maybe we wouldn't be here if Rugan had a little of that, eh?
Zhent02_Trap_59.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and the character are metting their eyes.NodeContext: Genuine laughter - you're threatening her gang despite the odds being heavily stacked against you. She's won over by it.

Zhent02_Trap_24.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_24.text: Oof. I got a tingle for a second there.
Zhent02_Trap_24.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player and the character are metting their eyes.NodeContext: Amused - player was  trying to sound fearsome, but it ultimately fell flat.

Zhent02_Trap_40.speaker: Player
Zhent02_Trap_40.text: Dead of boredom listening to you, pipsqueak.

Zhent02_Trap_32.speaker: Player
Zhent02_Trap_32.text: Profit's more important than vengeance. Let's make a deal.

Zhent02_Trap_29.speaker: Player
Zhent02_Trap_29.text: I've already shown I've got more wits than Rugan. Let's work together.

Zhent02_Trap_48.speaker: Player
Zhent02_Trap_48.text: I'm going to walk out of here alive. Play it right, and so will you.

Zhent02_Trap_6.speaker: Player
Zhent02_Trap_6.text: Look around for something you can use.

Zhent02_Trap_36.speaker: Narrator
Zhent02_Trap_36.text: *You spot explosives placed around the cavern. The Zhent are ready to bring the place down.*
Zhent02_Trap_36.context: CinematicNodeContext: The player spotted the explosives. Shot of explosives.InternalNodeContext: Showing the explosives.

Zhent02_Trap_3.speaker: Narrator
Zhent02_Trap_3.text: *You see nothing you can use. The mercenaries shift impatiently.*

Zhent02_Trap_49.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_49.text: No final plea? Good - reckon I've heard enough of those today.
Zhent02_Trap_49.context: NodeContext: As if vaguely surprised that you're not begging - but grimly pleased. She's run out of patience.

Zhent02_Trap_11.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_11.context: NodeContext: Barked order to the men behind her to take up their weapons.

Zhent02_Trap_43.speaker: Player
Zhent02_Trap_43.text: Can we just skip to the killing?

Zhent02_Trap_4.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_4.text: Hah! Of course - all you had to do was ask.
Zhent02_Trap_4.context: NodeContext: Genuinely amused - she likes your directness, and is all to happy to grant your request.

Zhent02_Trap_42.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_42.text: Which you should've known. That is, if you'd done your research before impersonating one of us.

Zhent02_Trap_30.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Trap_30.text: You're dead the moment you steal from the Zhentarim.
Zhent02_Trap_30.context: NodeContext: All joviality dropped - flat and icy-cold.

Dog_02_1.speaker: Isbeth
Dog_02_1.text: Going round again. Can't we just lie down?

Dog_02_2.speaker: Isbeth
Dog_02_2.text: Around and around again. Master gets confused, I think.

PAD_NoticedFakeWall_0.speaker: Player
PAD_NoticedFakeWall_0.text: That wall's an illusion! Hiding what, I wonder...

Zhent05_AD_Combat_PoisonUsed_0.speaker: Bellar
Zhent05_AD_Combat_PoisonUsed_0.text: I've been wanting to try this venom...
Zhent05_AD_Combat_PoisonUsed_0.context: NodeContext: Mid-combat, character is coating their weapon in poison.

Zhent07_AD_0.speaker: Vol
Zhent07_AD_0.text: Be just my luck to have the barrels go off in this damp.

Zhent07_AD_1.speaker: Vol
Zhent07_AD_1.text: Underdark run is just what this crew needs. Slice away the chaff, bigger shares for the strong.

Zhent07_AD_2.speaker: Vol
Zhent07_AD_2.text: Drip. Drip. Drip. Gods, I am bloody bored.

Zhent07_AD_3.speaker: Vol
Zhent07_AD_3.text: How the hell did Zarys make Swordhar? Never saw her work a day in her life.

Zhent05_AD_Combat_LeaderDied_0.speaker: Bellar
Zhent05_AD_Combat_LeaderDied_0.context: NodeContext: (Zar-iss, Sword-har) Your leader just died in combat - dismay, anger.

Zhent02_Dead_19.speaker: Narrator
Zhent02_Dead_19.text: *The corpse does not stir. It will answer no more questions.*

Zhent02_Dead_8.speaker: Player
Zhent02_Dead_8.text: What are the Zhentarim doing down here?

Zhent02_Dead_1.speaker: Player
Zhent02_Dead_1.text: What's in this cargo you're waiting for?

Zhent02_Dead_7.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Dead_7.text: Don't know... didn't ask... Zhentarim way...

Zhent02_Dead_10.speaker: Player
Zhent02_Dead_10.text: Where can I find this cargo?

Zhent02_Dead_12.speaker: Player
Zhent02_Dead_12.text: Do you know what happened to the tavern above?

Zhent02_Dead_17.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Dead_17.text: Ravengard... leader of Flaming Fist... bad for... business...

Zhent02_Dead_3.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Dead_3.text: ... Underdark... trading route... and graveyard both...

Zhent02_Dead_27.speaker: Player
Zhent02_Dead_27.text: Did you have anything of value?

Zhent02_Dead_29.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Dead_29.text: ...whole outpost... but you don't steal... from Zhentarim...

Zhent02_Dead_24.speaker: Narrator
Zhent02_Dead_24.text: *The spell's power wanes. You can ask no more questions.*

Zhent02_Dead_26.speaker: Narrator
Zhent02_Dead_26.text: *The corpse seems willing to speak - but not to its killer.*

Zhent02_Stage2_1.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Stage2_1.text: Can't say you weren't warned - steel it is.

Zhent02_Stage2_2.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Stage2_2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Zhentarim shoots a burning arrow at a puddle of oil and lights it.

Zhent02_Stage2_3.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Stage2_3.text: You have a death wish, happy to grant it.
Zhent02_Stage2_3.context: CinematicNodeContext: Zhentarim shoots a burning arrow at a puddle of oil and lights it.

Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_5.speaker: Garias
Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_5.text: I miss watching your artist paint.

Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_3.speaker: Brem
Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_3.text: I made a bucket of coins off him. When we get back to the gate, I'll take you to a museum.

Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_20.speaker: Brem
Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_20.text: Besides the bleedin' obvious? He misses the sun.

Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_23.speaker: Brem
Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_23.text: Needs light to work, he says. We had a chat - turns out he needs his eyes more.

Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_9.speaker: Brem
Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_9.text: Did I see you drawing something earlier?

Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_22.speaker: Garias
Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_22.text: So? Can do a better job than that ponce you sold.

Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_4.speaker: Brem
Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_4.text: Huh. Keep it up, little brother - might be I can sell you some day.

Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_10.speaker: Garias
Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_10.text: Did that artist really paint all those things?

Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_16.speaker: Brem
Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_16.text: Says his muse made him do it.

Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_21.speaker: Brem
Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_21.text: Gods, little brother - read a bleedin' book.

Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_17.speaker: Garias
Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_17.text: Here, make your fella draw me something.

Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_25.speaker: Garias
Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_25.text: Yeah, all right, fine. Who are you, his muse?

Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_14.speaker: Brem
Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_14.text: Don't pretend you know what that means. What kind of drawin' you want?

Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_0.speaker: Brem
Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_0.text: Like, any kind of birds, or...

Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_1.speaker: Garias
Zhent03_AD_Zhent04_1.text: Pretty ones. With colours and stuff.

DoubtingArtist_AD_Cowering_0.speaker: Oskar Fevras
DoubtingArtist_AD_Cowering_0.text: Shitting hells, will this never end?!
DoubtingArtist_AD_Cowering_0.context: InternalNodeContext: The artist has been freed by the player, He is leaving the cave, but on the path he feels threatened by something

DoubtingArtist_AD_Cowering_1.speaker: Oskar Fevras
DoubtingArtist_AD_Cowering_1.context: InternalNodeContext: All the Zhent around the artist are dead. Now he is threatened by something.

DoubtingArtist_AD_Cowering_2.speaker: Oskar Fevras
DoubtingArtist_AD_Cowering_2.text: Well?! You bought me, so save me! Please!
DoubtingArtist_AD_Cowering_2.context: InternalNodeContext: The player bought the artist. Now, the artist feel threatened by something.

DoubtingArtist_AD_Cowering_3.speaker: Oskar Fevras
DoubtingArtist_AD_Cowering_3.text: I'm, uh - I'm sure you have more pressing concerns than talking to me.
DoubtingArtist_AD_Cowering_3.context: InternalNodeContext: The player entered peacefully the hideout. The artist is threatend by something : almost surely a fight between player and zhent erupted.

DoubtingArtist_AD_Cowering_4.speaker: Oskar Fevras
DoubtingArtist_AD_Cowering_4.text: Gods, oh gods - this isn't happening.
DoubtingArtist_AD_Cowering_4.context: InternalNodeContext: Zhent are fleeing to tha back of the cave. Traps are active around the artist and are going to go off soon.

Zhent05_0.speaker: Bellar
Zhent05_0.text: You seem a nice sort - I'm glad we didn't have to kill you.

Zhent05_1.speaker: Bellar
Zhent05_1.text: Flaming Fist crawling above and the Underdark waiting below. Don't know which I like less.

Zhent05_2.speaker: Bellar
Zhent05_2.text: Olly was a decent lad. Pained me to cut on him like that.
Zhent05_2.context: NodeContext: Bellar is referring to a friend he 'had' to torture to death. Bellar is a bit of a sociopath.

Zhent05_3.speaker: Bellar
Zhent05_3.text: See my handiwork? He started squealing before the knives came out, truth be told. But it pays to be thorough.
Zhent05_3.context: NodeContext: Bellar is referring to a friend he 'had' to torture to death. Bellar is a bit of a sociopath.

Zhent02_AD_Stage1Darkness_0.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_AD_Stage1Darkness_0.text: Our visitor's taking out the lights! Fall back!

Zhent02_AD_Stage1Darkness_1.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_AD_Stage1Darkness_1.text: Someone's taking out the lights! Fall back!

Zhent07_AD_TrapsActivated_0.speaker: Vol
Zhent07_AD_TrapsActivated_0.text: Run! Rugan's friend set off the traps!

AD_InvestigationCheck2_0.speaker: Player
AD_InvestigationCheck2_0.text: Locked. Best find another way in.

DoubtingArtist_AD_Idle_0.speaker: Oskar Fevras
DoubtingArtist_AD_Idle_0.text: Look - there's no need for this. Free me now and I'll see that my patron rewards you!
DoubtingArtist_AD_Idle_0.context: NodeContext: He's trying to get the attention of his captors, trying to be personable and bargain his way free

DoubtingArtist_AD_Idle_6.speaker: Oskar Fevras
DoubtingArtist_AD_Idle_6.text: I need only tell her it's a gambling debt - it's happened before!

DoubtingArtist_AD_Idle_3.speaker: Oskar Fevras
DoubtingArtist_AD_Idle_3.text: Ye watching gods - I don't know any prayers, but rescue me from this pit and I swear that I will change.

DoubtingArtist_AD_Idle_2.speaker: Oskar Fevras
DoubtingArtist_AD_Idle_2.text: I'll drink only in the temple district, that you may keep an eye on me. Please.
DoubtingArtist_AD_Idle_2.context: NodeContext: As if making a concession if the gods save him

DoubtingArtist_AD_Idle_4.speaker: Oskar Fevras
DoubtingArtist_AD_Idle_4.text: Maybe I'll drink my paints, hm? You won't get your damn ransom then!
DoubtingArtist_AD_Idle_4.context: NodeContext: Challenging, petulant - they want to keep him prisoner so he's threatening to kill himself (not remotely intending to follow through on it, just out of spite)

DoubtingArtist_AD_Idle_5.speaker: Oskar Fevras
DoubtingArtist_AD_Idle_5.text: I have friends in the city - friends you do not want as enemies, you hear?!
DoubtingArtist_AD_Idle_5.context: NodeContext: Threatening, pompous - calling to his captors

DoubtingArtist_AD_Idle_1.speaker: Oskar Fevras
DoubtingArtist_AD_Idle_1.text: Gods - I'm going to die in the dark.
DoubtingArtist_AD_Idle_1.context: NodeContext: To himself - meek and defeated

Zhent08_0.speaker: Karad
Zhent08_0.text: Bloody Fist - not like they weren't paid well enough to ignore us in the first place.

Zhent08_1.speaker: Karad
Zhent08_1.text: Wouldn't linger down here, I were you - see all that smokepowder?

Zhent08_2.speaker: Karad
Zhent08_2.text: The Flaming Fist won't find nothing here but rubble.

Zhent01_AD_Idle_0.speaker: Salazon
Zhent01_AD_Idle_0.context: NodeContext: Bored with his menial task.

Zhent01_AD_Idle_1.speaker: Salazon
Zhent01_AD_Idle_1.context: NodeContext: Considering a big stack of boxes he's been told to sort through for the journey ahead.

Zhent01_AD_Idle_2.speaker: Salazon
Zhent01_AD_Idle_2.text: Where's the last of the bloody smokepowder?
Zhent01_AD_Idle_2.context: NodeContext: Sorting through belongings, annoyed he can't find something

Zhent01_AD_Idle_3.speaker: Salazon
Zhent01_AD_Idle_3.text: Better to the fire than the Fist.
Zhent01_AD_Idle_3.context: NodeContext: He's sad to be leaving valuables behind, but he knows he's going to burn them rather than give them over to a rival faction

Zhent04_0.speaker: Garias
Zhent04_0.text: You don't want to keep Zarys waiting, believe me.

Zhent04_1.speaker: Garias
Zhent04_1.text: You don't want to keep Zarys waiting, believe me.

Zhent04_2.speaker: Garias
Zhent04_2.text: Don't touch anything you ain't paid for.

Zhent02_Stage3_0.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Stage3_0.text: You're making a bad mistake, my friend. Last chance to turn back.

Zhent02_Stage3_1.speaker: Zarys
Zhent02_Stage3_1.text: Why couldn't you just run away, you stlarning lunatic?
Zhent02_Stage3_1.context: NodeContext: Stlarning is a harsh curse word in her world. You've forced her to turn around and kill you
